body_html:
@Carmezim I thought it would be updated by now, but I'm honestly not sure how and when the website gets built these days. I'd guess it would be no later than the 1.1 release, but I'd hope it could be sooner....

@wolffg Do you know when the doc changes in #9279 (applied to the r1.1 branch) will be visible to website visitors? Should we backport them to the master or r1.0 branches as well?

@Carmezim I thought it would be updated by now, but I'm honestly not sure how and when the website gets built these days. I'd guess it would be no later than the 1.1 release, but I'd hope it could be sooner....

@wolffg Do you know when the doc changes in #9279 (applied to the r1.1 branch) will be visible to website visitors? Should we backport them to the master or r1.0 branches as well?
